column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Our Server Breanne was great
column4: always checking up on us to make sure we're doing good. We were informed about their popular whiskey infused cocktails
column5: the drinks were a bit pricy for me ($14)
column6: but I had to try one
column7: so I ordered the Bosslady. It had a nice strong taste with a complex blackberry aftertaste
column8: it was SO good! We ordered a few starters the porkbelly poutine and tomato bisque
column9: and for our entree the short ribs.
